About Me

About Me: Hi, I'm Zach Holmes, an aspiring full-stack web developer and cybersecurity student currently serving as the head of IT for a small business with 10 staff members.

My journey began with a strong curiosity for problem-solving and a passion for creating innovative solutions. As a student of full-stack web development and cybersecurity pen testing, I'm committed to continuous learning and adapting to the latest industry trends.

I have a particular interest in radio mesh networks and their potential to enhance communication and data sharing in non-permissive environments. The integration of mesh radios with ATAK (Android Team Awareness Kit) presents a powerful solution, offering real-time situational awareness and secure, decentralized communication in various scenarios.

When I'm not immersed in tech projects or managing IT operations, I enjoy exploring the great outdoors.

Let's connect and discuss how we can leverage technology, such as mesh radios and ATAK, to build a safer, more connected world together.
